# amalitech-nav-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                           | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active`   | `active`   | Whether the nav item is active or not | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether the nav item is disabled      | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event    | Description                                | Type                |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------- |
| `switch` | Event emitted when the nav item is clicked | `CustomEvent<void>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                          | Description                               |
| ----------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| `--nav-item-active-color`     | The color of the nav item when active     |
| `--nav-item-active-font-size` | The font size of the nav item when active |
| `--nav-item-font-size`        | The font size of the nav item             |
